      • drawPage

        private void drawPage(Bitmap bitmap,
            int pageNumber,
            int width,
            int height,
            int rectX,
            int rectY,
            int rectW,
            int rectH)
        Draw a pdf page into a canvas.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - The bitmap canvas.
        pageNumber - The page number.
        width - The bitmap width.
        height - The bitmap height.
        rectX - X coordinate of the rectangle to draw.
        rectY - Y coordinate of the rectangle to draw.
        rectW - Width of the rectangle to draw.
        rectH - Height of the rectangle to draw.
